titles.title: Mäṣḥafä ḥǝmamatihu wä-zena sǝqlätu lä-ʾIyäsus Krǝstos “Book of the Passion and Story of the Crucifixion of Jesus Christ” / Gädlä Täklä Maryam “Vita of Täklä Maryam (Mäbaʿa Ṣǝyon)” / Täʾamrä täzkarä motu lä-ʾIyäsus Krǝstos “Miracles Concerning the Commemoration of the Death of Jesus Christ” / Miracles of the Saviour of the World worked by ʾabunä Täklä Maryam / How Zärʾa Buruk loved the Saviour of the World / Sälam lä-zǝkrä sǝmǝkä zä-ʾi-räkäbu täfṣametä mälaʾǝktä sämay... “Salutation to the mention of your name...”

shortcontents.shortcontent: I) Mäṣḥafä ḥǝmamatihu wä-zena sǝqlätu lä-ʾIyäsus Krǝstos “Book of the Passion and Story of the Crucifixion of Jesus Christ” (fols. 3ra-39vb) I-1) Introduction (fols. 3ra-va) I-2) Homily for Mäggabit (fols. 3vb-8rb) I-3) Homily for Miyazya (entitled Zena sǝqlätu lä-ʾǝgziʾǝnä ʾIyäsus Krǝstos “Story of the Crucifixion of Our Lord Jesus Christ”) (fols. 8rb-19ra) I-4) Homily for Gǝnbot (fols. 19ra-20vb) I-5) Homily for Säne (fols. 20vb-22va) I-6) Homily for Ḥamle (fols. 22va-24rb) I-7) Homily for Näḥase (fols. 24rb-26ra) I-8) Homily for Mäskäräm (fols. 26ra-28rb) I-9) Homily for Ṭǝqǝmt (fols. 28rb-30rb) I-10) Homily for Ḫǝdar (fols. 30rb-32vb) I-11) Homily for Taḫśaś (fols. 32vb-34va) I-12) Homily for Ṭǝrr (fols. 34va-36vb) I-13) Homily for Yäkkatit (fols. 36vb-39vb) II) Gädlä Täklä Maryam “Vita of Täklä Maryam (Mäbaʿa Ṣǝyon)” (fols. 39va-72ra) III) Täʾamrä täzkarä motu lä-ʾIyäsus Krǝstos “Miracles Concerning the Commemoration of the Death of Jesus Christ”, 5 miracles (fols. 72ra-77va) IV) Miracles of the Saviour of the World worked by ʾabunä Täklä Maryam: 3 miracles (fols. 77va-79ra) V) How Zärʾa Buruk loved the Saviour of the World (fols. 79va-80rb) VI) Sälam lä-zǝkrä sǝmǝkä zä-ʾi-räkäbu täfṣametä mälaʾǝktä sämay... “Salutation to the mention of your name...” (fols. 80rb-83ra) (cp. ChRep 202, no. 164).

copyists.copyist: Gäbrä Maryam is mentioned as the scribe in the supplication formulas on fols. 80rb and 82vb.

donors.donor: Several names are mentioned in the supplication formulas in the main hand: Wälättä Täklä Haymanot (e.g., fols. 3va, 16va, 28rb, 57rb, 76rb, 80rb, 83ra), Wälättä Śǝllase (e.g., fols. 22va, 34va, 80rb, 83ra), ʿƎquba Mikaʾel (e.g., fols. 52ra, 71vb, 80rb, 82vb), Kidanä Maryam (e.g., fols. 54ra, 65rb, 74va, 78ra, 80rb), Täwäldä Mädḫǝn (e.g., fols. 55va, 65rb, 71vb, 78vb), Zä-Wäldä Maryam (fols. 65va, 74va, 80rb, 83ra), Wälättä Maryam (fols. 76rb, 80rb), Täklä Maryam (fol. 71vb).

txstates.txstate: The leather cover is sligtly worn and abraided at the edges of the boards; some fols. are slightly stained with wax and dirt (e.g., fols. 15v, 45r, 81r). The upper endband is partly torn off from the spine. Many leaves are stained with water esp. in the upper margin (e.g., fols. 49v, 55v, 56v, 61r). Fols. 1-2 are of smaller size. Holes and tears amended on fols. 1, 71, 77.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with deep brown tooled leather; textile inlays. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (at least 3 tools were used: cross hatching, fourfold line fillet, double circle).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of the endband stitches at the spine cover.

inks.ink: Black (bleak on some fols.; brown: eg., fols. 56rb, 78va), red (vermillion, sometimes brilliant vermillion, fol. 80rb)

squires.squire: A(2/fols. 1r-2v) – I(8/fols. 3r-10v) – ፪II(8/fols. 11r-18v) – ፫III(6/fols. 19r-24v) – ፬IV(8/fols. 25r-32v) – ፭V(8/fols. 33r-40v) – ፮VI(8/fols. 41r-48v) – ፯VII(8/fols. 49r-56v) – ፰VIII(8/fols. 57r-64v) – ፱IX(8/fols. 65r-72v) – ፲X(73r-80v) – B(4/fols. 81r-84v).

taunit.mr-info:
Fols. 3-18 (quires I-II)
All data for fol. 7r.
taunit.rl-info:
Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.
Fols. 11 and 18 have two additional bottom ruled lines not used by the scribe.

taunit.mr-info:
Fols. 19-83 (quires III-B)
All data for fol. 22r.
taunit.rl-info:
Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.
Fol. 52 has one additional bottom ruled line not used by the scribe. The scribe disregarded the ruled lines to accommodate the end of the text on fols. 79v-83r.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: It is possible that several hands were involved in the writing (s. e.g., fol. 11r, 67rb).

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra name of the protagonist of Text II, name of the donors and his family members; elements of the punctuation signs, of the text dividers and of the quire marks; elements of Ethiopic numerals. Several groups of lines on the incipit pages of Texts I-1 and II, alternating with black lines; initial two lines of each section of Text I, II, V, VI, and of each miracle of Texts III and IV; the words sälam “salutation” and sǝbḥat “glory” in Text VI; first word of each stanza in Text VI.

abbreviations.abbreviation: ለ፡ ዓ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 40rb) ለዓ፡ ዓ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 28rb, 76rb) ለዓ፡ ዓ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 73ra, 76rb, 78ra, 79ra) ዓ፡ ዓለ፡ አን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 26ra) ለዓ፡ ዓ፡ አሜን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 34va, 73ra, 78ra) ለዓ፡ ዓለ፡ አሜን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 30rb, 40rb, 77va) ለዓለመ፡ ዓ፡ አሜን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 59va, 78vb) ለዓለመ፡ ዓለ፡ አሜን፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 74va) ለዓለመ፡ ዓለመ፡ አሜ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 3va) መ፡ ዓለ፡ for መድኃኔ፡ ዓለም፡ (fol. 82va).

otherdetails.otherdetail: Miracle 1 of Text IV is not numbered, miracles 2-3 are numbered 7-8 as a continuation of miracles of Text III.

extras.extra: - The scribe used compressed script to accommodate the end of the text: fols 79vb-83ra. - Omitted letters or words inserted interlineally: e.g., fols. 4rb, 13va, 21va, 45rb, 57rb, 67va, 73ra, 81vb. - Omitted letter added at the beginning of the line in small script, possibly in a secondary hand: fol. 26rb. - Erasures: fols. 12va, 17ra, 72rb. - Erasures marked with red lines: fol. 12ra. - Correction written over erasure in red ink in the main hand: fol. 42rb. - Immediate corrections indicated by lines over the word: fols. 27vb, 62va, 80rb (here in a secondary hand). - Immediate corrections indicated by thin black or red dashes above and below the letters: e.g., fols. 32rb, 36ra, 55vb, 72vb. - Lacunae (spaces for rubricated names left unfilled): e.g., fols. 40vb, 66va, 68ra, 72rb. - Scribbles and doodles: e.g., fols. 1r, 2v, 15r, 60r, 83r, 84r.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Decorated quire marks are written in the left upper margin in the main hand: fols. 11r ፪, fol. 19r: ፫, fol. 25r: ፬, fol. 33r: ፭, fol. 41r: ፮ (undecorated), fol. 49r: ፯, fol. 57: ፰, fol. 65r: ፱, fol. 73r: ፲ (undecorated).

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Readings of Text I are indicated by the names of the months written in the upper margin, in a recent secondary hand: መጋቢድት፡ (sic) fol. 3r ሚዝያ፡ (sic) fol. 8ra ግንቦት፡ fol. 19r ሰንኔ (sic) fol. 21r ሃምልየ fol. 22va ነሃሴ fol. 24rb መስከረም፡ fol. 26rb ጥቅምት፡ fol. 28rb ህዳር፡ fol. 30rb ታህሳስ፡ fol. 32vb ጥር፡ fol. 34va የካቲት፡ fol. 36vb - Readings of Text II are indicated by the names of the days crudely written in the upper margin in blue pen in a recent secondary hand: ዘስኑይ፡ fol. 40r ዘሰሉስ፡ fol. 44rb ዘረቡአ፡ fol. 48vb ዘሐሙስ፡ fol. 54ra ዘአርብ፡ fol. 55va ዘእሁድ፡ (in red ink) fol. 65va ዘአሁድ፡ ዘትገሣኤ፡ (?) ዘጰረቅሊጤስ፡ fol. 65v.

frames.frame: - Fol. 3r (incipit page of Text I-1): coloured (strong red, black) ornamental band; geometric motifs.
